app.name: Steamed Hams
app.coder: TheMrIron2, Superintendent "Super Nintendo" Chalmers, Seymour Skinner
app.long_description: Have you ever wanted a channel that does absolutely nothing but play one of the greatest clips ever shown on television? Have you ever wanted a channel about your favourite Albany expression? Look no further! The Steamed Hams Channel does everything you can possibly need, including playing the famous Steamed Hams video as well as looking awesome on your Wii Menu!
